评论详情: The wrinkles are hard to get out. The color isn’t what I was expecting, I thought it would be more cranberry it’s not. It’s very burgundy colored. The straps were very tangled. It also looked more like lingerie than formal wear.

WAY too much side boob. If the straps were to connect to the back of the dress through loops or something to better hold up the chest area, that would probably solve it, BUT as it is a boob could slip out at any moment.

评论用户: This product fits perfect. The sizing is a little in the smaller size but if you go up to the next size they fit like a glove. The pants are also long enough for someone tall. I’m 5”10 and they nearly hit the ground.
评论详情: It’s a great dress. Definitely shows a lot of skin but fits great. It fits how you tie it. The material is kind of cheep. It’s definitely a wear once kind of dress but it is gorgeous on.
The body fit me perfectly, chest was too large.

The dress came in with frayed ends and strings hanging out of every seam. The night I was intending to wear it the strap on the left side tore off the bodice with no previous wear. This dress comes falling apart.
I used as a costume dress. The material is soft and fresh. Still I think is pricey I could get the same one dress half price in shein but I need it for a last minute event.
Elastic cuts in around the waist and it was hard to keep the girls in place, I have this in a floral and it doesn’t look as cheap as the green. Returned
Love it

The top was a rectangle, so if you aren’t looking for a lot of side boob, I wouldn’t recommend. The small fitted fine, but I wouldn’t call it flattering on me.  I decided to return this because I didn’t feel it would be appropriate for the occasion I needed it for
Really wanted to love it. But just couldn’t fabric feels cheaply made once tied it bunches weird on my back.

I loved everything about this $30 steal BUT if you have larger boobs and font want a lot of side boob, skip this one. The bib is short so although the front is covered, the is major side boob and I cant show up to a fam event with allllll that out. Other than that, perfect!

Item was to be used as a bridesmaids dress however it did not work. The dress was nice material but didn’t have good support. The dress didn’t look like the shape pictured and kind of just hung loosely on.

评论概述: Very thin satin material but cute
评论详情: This is a cute dress. The fabric is very thin. I didn’t end up wearing it to the event. It is very revealing with a deep plunging neckline…. The color is very pretty and as shown. The tie for the neck was super long… still have not figured out why… maybe a special way of tying it? Light weight and great for summer.

I love the style of this dress. I have it in a few colors. This time though, the quality was SO poor. Stitches coming apart, seams rippling, the bottom isn't cut straight. It makes me super sad because this is also the MOST I've ever paid for this dress! The other colors were way cheaper and higher quality when I got them a year ago. This is not at all worth the money. Unfortunately I had to keep the dress as I ordered it too close to my event.
Fit true to size. Adjustable straps. Very comfortable and breathable
This dress is more like a cheap nightgown. I do not recommend ordering this "cocktail dress"
I returned it.

This dress I bought 1 month postpartum and I loved it. I wore shapewear with it and it was very flattering. The straps are super long so you can control how tight it is and how you want to tie it around your waist. It covered well. Loved the slit. Very great price! And so many colors to choose from.

I absolutely love this dress. Unfortunately, I was unable to keep it because the top is not big enough for my chest. I am a 42DDD. It took me a good 20-30 minutes to get it to where I wasn't falling out, and even then, there was spillage. It is a true shame. The dress is a beautiful color and fit, even with a pregnant belly.

So I did order this dress when it was on sale and I’m so glad because for 20$ you can’t beat it. I’m not sure if it worth more than 30$ to be honest with you. It was very nice for a wedding guest dress. The slit is REALLLLY high and if you’re dancing around people might get a free show and the straps are super long to the point where you aren’t too sure what to do with it. But overall I’m happy with the purchase!
Dress worked great because it’s technically a 3/4 length dress but since I’m 5’3” it was the perfect floor length dress!
Very gorgeous dress, but straps were so confusing. I ended up cutting the straps and tying it the easy way.

It’s alright. Could work better maybe if I tied the straps differently but on my body it fit so weird. Thankfully I just needed it for one quick photo and now returning. By the way, go read the ACOTAR series and picture me as Morr hehe
Didn’t even care to try it on. It’s so thin, and the straps are entirely way to long. No support, and awkward length. Very wrinkled too.

Wore this to a blacktie wedding and could not have been happier! The dress looked much more expensive than it is. The straps tie around your waist in a way that makes your chest feel very secure though I did add some fashion tape, I dont think needed. I felt very comfortable and classy all night in this dress

This dress was everything a curvy girl could ask for! Nice fabric, split in the right place. Color was so good! The string was extremely long but very functional. Loved this purchase now I want every color!
I wanted to love it but I’m big in the bust area and it was perfect in every area but the bust area.

The style of this dress is great aside from the fact that it is a single piece of fabric throughout the entire dress aside from the chest area. If you put it to a window it’s completely see through! I wanted to love this but goodness there needs to be more than one layer or fabric and for the price! Absolutely not- returning it.
Wore this when I was pregnant. It is not cheap see through costume material satin. It's actually quality. I received so many compliments.

Purchased this dress as a replacement to the Shein dress that was too big and smaller size not available. Nice material but very unflattering baggy fit in chest! Chest had double material that caused chest triangles to be very baggy.
Not refunded to product after it was mailed back completely unworn

Found a few accounts in tiktok reviewing the dress and it really looked good but once I put it on it was giving a weird vibe.. the skirt part felt like it had too much fabric and ngl if you are a DD or above (bra size) it just doesn’t look nice. It’s giving an OompaLoompa 😅

Honestly thought this was going to be cute.. BUT don't be like me. Don't waste your money 🤷‍♀️ this dress looks CHEAP, it looks like a 3 dollar dress. No shape, cheap fabric, altogether save your bucks and go elsewhere.

I’m 230lb. Small bust. Bottom heavy. I will say you have to be careful if a gust of wind happens, you WILL flash the public. Other than that it was a pretty dress. I wore it to my graduation and I felt so pretty in it. It wrinkles a bit but nothing a little iron to help. I got a size L.
thin fabric but bold color - fun vacation dress - just buy smaller than you think - it's large
This dress is perfect. The silly material is very flattering and comfortable. The straps are long strings which I love because you can adjust how tight you want everything!
I wore this dress to my sorority formal and it was soo cute and comfortable!!! The length and the open back were perfect. I love this dress
Felt amazing on! So comfortable and beautiful!
It fits way too small didn’t like it tried to return it and it won’t let me return it don’t buy

VERY cheap material! I intended to wear it as a costume anyways but omg! The “satin” is cheap as hell and the straps/strings are ridiculously and laughably long!! Now because they are soooo long you have to wrap them around you and contort them so many ways that when you’re finally going to take it off the sewing on the straps/strings come undone and it just looks like a half sewn tube of fabric. Just cheap. If you’re looking for a gown, look elsewhere, but if you’re looking for a quick costume, then go for it!

This was a spectacular disappointment. I ordered a medium for an actor in a show I’m directing. It technically fit, but even on a very conventionally attractive body (130, 5’7” or so), and the length was at their ankles. I’d expect the quality from a $20 dress, not a $45 one.

Fits beautifully but was a bit disappointed in colour. Looks more like a light blue to me. A little too much fabric at the bottom so slit doesn't show even modestly unless you stick your leg out. May be as a result of body type. I'm 5ft 4 and 148lbs got a small I think
Great for beach wedding use stickies and go backless!

I bought this dress for an event and I got SO many compliments on it. It was super comfortable, but the fabric is super thin, it shows every lump and bump you have on your body. I am a shower gal (4’11”) so the dress was very very long. As the fabric is thing the dress creased very easily.But over all happy with this product.
I received so many compliments on this dress its really pretty and comfortable to.
Cowl neck style: If you have a large chest, do not go this. It only covered half of my breasts. It was pretty other than this. The entire sides of my breasts were shown.
Wore this for a wedding!! DEFINITELY needs ironed first!!!
I love the open back but the material is very cheap and thin.

The dress is very long, thin, silky, and comfortable with extra long straps to tie in a variety of styles. Recommend wearing pasties and maybe a pin to keep the slit from riding too high while walking. Wore to a bachelorette party and added body jewelry. Lots of compliments!
Tag is still in tact. Just took it out of the packaging. I have an event to go to and now I'm going to have to find something else to wear. It's got the awful residue on the dress. I'm so livid.

The triangles were beyond tiny. In addition to the barely there chest piece, the material was such poor quality. There are much better, similar priced sexy options than this one.

I love this dress! Its very Elegant if you choose the right color and give it a good steam before you wear it! I wish I had a photo from when I wore it but its a great option! I would definitely recommend one of the darker colors like black, deep red, emerald green, etc.
Purchased this dress to attend a wedding. It was as expected. Gorgeous!! Although the strings to tie were extremely long, it was stunning.
Tying it is a little  tricky - the color is beautiful the material is so soft and silky - the boob area is too big and no support tho

Love 100%. No complaints. Fabric is thick enough to be not see-through. I am about 5’5” and it hits the floor. XS fit perfect as I am a tiny human. it is not the same as the photo, I’m very disappointed

I’m 5’ 5” wore sandals and this dress just barely missed hitting the floor. The texture is silky and if you curvy like I am (roughly 180 lbs) it will make you look amazing! 10/10 would buy again! Was ok but the material made it look less eligant  and kinda cheap

I ordered a Matcha Green color and what arrived was a pale yellow, no where near green. I also ordered a medium and the dress fit like an extra large.
My daughter purchased this dress to wear to a wedding, and she looked stunning.  It’s youthful and elegant, and truly enhanced her figure in a tasteful manner.  She highly recommends it.
Super thin material strings started falling off but otherwise it was a great dress to practice sewing with

Need a dress for a wedding and this is NOT it. The material is terrible and idk why no one is talking about it. The idea is cute but do it with some better material guys.

This dress is so classy yet very sexy. Perfect fit , used some boob tape to keep the girls in place and the dress didn’t show the tape at all. Good material. Highly recommend.

A great look for the price. The fabric is not the greatest quality, but this dress was a one time wear for me. It is long and the slit shows plenty of leg. It's flowy and light, comfortable and beautiful.

Perfect dress for a bday disco party! We were the hit of the night :)

Love the fit but a little annoyed as mine came straight out of the package with a very clear stain on it , not sure what it is .. looks like something oily maybe makeup or a cleaning product but it will not come out at all. Really impressive dress when it comes to quality and material but it runs really big. I am returning this dress to get a smaller size as the chest area was wayyy to big for me and I am large busted. I got the cowl neckline dress. I don’t know what I was expecting when I bought this dress, but it was very very thin material. When first putting it on, I noticed one of my straps had immediately broken which made the item even more defective.

This dress is absolutely stunning in every way. Very stretchy waist band and you can really tailor the neckline based on how you tie the straps. My only con is this dress will give you a goddess complex. Buy at everyones risk around you but I say do it. 👁👄👁

评论概述: 2 dresses- one was perfect, one damaged
评论详情: I ordered 2 dresses, one in pink and one in blue. I LOVE the blue dress, received so many compliments on it. It's very flattering. It does get wrinkly really fast though. I only gave 2 stars because the dress in pink I really wanted to wear came damaged. The strap was ripped off of the dress and there were multiple stains on the dress.  If you are going to buy this dress, I would say to buy 2 of the same dresses just in case one is defective/damaged.

The dress is beautiful! Definitely looks like the picture especially if you have the models body type however I got mine used. The stitched on the bottom was coming apart and it hard a couple stains on it.

I love this dress! It is beautiful!! I knew it would be more loose up top because I don’t have much but I can tie up and it fits snug. Also waist is elastic and fits great. Long on me because I’m also 5’2. I got there for a photo shoot and it is going to be perfect! The color is beautiful as well

评论概述: Beautiful, looked expensive and so many compliments

it took me a while to figure out how to tie it, but I love it ! it exceeded all my expectations, I got this dress as a back up because the original one hadn’t shipped yet and the dress came in 4 days and was perfect!!!
